name: Immunity Community
description:
You play as 3 components of the immune system, macrophage (white blood cells), a Helper T cell, and a Killer T cell. Each character has different mechanics that you have to utilise in order to beat the demo much like the lost vikings.

Use Killer T's Antigen Bullets to disable Virus Shield, and Macrophage's Lysome Blade to attack Virus, Helper T can revive fallen Cells and phase through certain walls. 

WASD -Move

Left Mouse - Attack

1 2 3 - Switch between Characters

SHIFT- Dash

Space Bar- Jump and Double Jump
